assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Permission for this project was obtained as a health researcher in adherence with the Statistics Act, 1993, which allows access to more detailed vital statistics to those engaged in medical or social research.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Emer Gunne, Sally Ann Lynch, Cliona McGarvey, Karina Hamilton and Deborah Lambert have no competing interests to declare. ‘Results are based on analysis of strictly controlled Research Microdata Files provided by the Central Statistics Office (CSO). The CSO does not take any responsibility for the views expressed or the outputs generated from this research’.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
